aboutMe.title: Hello!
aboutMe.title-content: I want to design user experiences and create a better society through technology.
aboutMe.title-content-2: Based on human-centered HCI and UX, I aim to build solid skills from front-end to back-end in order to develop web services that solve problems and create value.
aboutMe.my-story-content: I developed a strong interest in the impact of digital media—especially social media—on our world while studying media in college. This interest naturally led me to explore IT service planning and development, and eventually inspired me to pursue a career as a developer.My goal is to enhance user experience from a truly user-centric perspective, focusing on user-friendly web development. I aim to solve user problems and ultimately drive positive social change through the services I build. Beyond acquiring technical knowledge as a developer, I also enjoy thinking about the philosophy of technology and how it shapes our society. If any of this resonates with you, I’d love to discuss it further together!
aboutMe.mission-content: As a passionate web developer, my mission is to create innovative and user-centric websites that enhance digital experiences. I strive to blend cutting-edge technologies with creative design to deliver solutions that not only meet but exceed client expectations. Committed to continuous learning and excellence, I aim to contribute meaningfully to every project I undertake.
aboutMe.skills-content: My vision is to become a leading web developer recognized for transforming ideas into seamless and impactful digital solutions. I aspire to drive the evolution of web technologies, fostering a more connected and accessible online world. By prioritizing quality, collaboration, and sustainability, I seek to inspire and empower businesses and individuals through exceptional web development.
aboutMe.more-about-me-btn: Want to know more about me?

resume.time-line-content-bootcamp-1: Acquired foundational knowledge in IT service planning, design, and development essential for a project manager
resume.time-line-content-bootcamp-2: Collaborated with corporate partners on projects, contributing to planning and UX proposals
resume.time-line-content-study-2: Gained experience through small-scale personal projects
resume.time-line-content-academy-2: Engaged in a team project for web service development
resume.projects1-content: Community web service for cyclists to gather and share routes
resume.projects1-sub-content-1: - Selected technology stack and designed system architecture (established team development strategy based on GitHub Flow)
resume.projects1-sub-content-2: - Implemented global authentication state management using Zustand and access control with Private Routes
resume.projects1-sub-content-3: - Optimized performance and UX by automatically generating route images on the backend upon GPX upload
resume.projects1-sub-content-4: - Established secure authentication and authorization using Spring Security, JWT, and HTTP-only cookies
resume.projects1-sub-content-5: - Integrated Strava API and Kakao Map API for visualizing external data
resume.projects2-content: Web service for searching and analyzing game statistics using Riot Games API
resume.projects2-sub-content-1: - Solely responsible for frontend development, designed and optimized component architecture and API communication structure
resume.projects2-sub-content-2: - Developed user search component focused on UX, optimizing search performance with a custom debounce hook
resume.projects2-sub-content-3: - Implemented responsive tooltip components for game items, providing contextual information based on image position
resume.projects2-sub-content-4: - Proposed and led the adoption of NoSQL (MongoDB)
resume.projects2-sub-content-5: - Improved loading performance by minimizing data payload
resume.projects3-sub-content-1: - Personal portfolio built with Next.js and TypeScript
resume.projects3-sub-content-2: - Implemented multilingual support, theme switching, and markdown-based content management
resume.projects3-sub-content-3: - Improved loading efficiency and user experience by properly separating server and client components
resume.projects4-sub-content-1: - Developed a Twitter clone web service using Next.js 14 and Server Actions
resume.projects4-sub-content-2: - Implemented authentication using Prisma, PostgreSQL, iron-session, and bcrypt
resume.projects4-sub-content-3: - Experienced full-stack development cycle, gaining skills in SSR/CSR, type safety, and responsive UI
resume.projects5-sub-content-1: - Built UI with React and TypeScript, including animations and modal-based detail views
resume.projects5-sub-content-2: - Efficiently handled data fetching and state management using React Query
resume.projects5-sub-content-3: - Integrated smooth animation effects using Framer Motion
resume.projects6-content: Web service for tracking cryptocurrency prices
resume.projects6-sub-content-1: - Developed a tracker-style web service displaying real-time cryptocurrency information
resume.projects6-sub-content-2: - Managed state and visualized data using React, TypeScript, React Query, and Recoil
resume.projects6-sub-content-3: - Implemented various user-friendly features including dark mode, responsive UI, and chart functionalities
